name: Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) Model Input and Execution
description: Defines inputs for and executes a Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) analysis to estimate enterprise and equity value.

historicalFinancialSummary.description: Summary of historical financials, typically including last actual year's revenue, EBITDA, D&A, NWC, Capex. (Structure could align with output of a financial summary CACM).

projectionYears.description: Number of explicit years for cash flow projection (e.g., 5 or 10).

weightedAverageCostOfCapital.description: Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC) as a decimal (e.g., 0.08 for 8%).

terminalGrowthRate.description: Perpetual growth rate for calculating terminal value, as a decimal (e.g., 0.02 for 2%).

forecastAssumptions.description: Key assumptions for projecting line items.

revenueGrowthRates.description: Array of revenue growth rates for each projection year.

ebitdaMargins.description: Array of EBITDA margins for each projection year.

capexAsPercentageOfRevenue.description: Array of Capex as % of Revenue for each projection year.

changeInNWCAsPercentageOfRevenueChange.description: Array of Change in Net Working Capital as % of Revenue Change for each projection year.

netDebt.description: Company's current net debt (Total Debt - Cash & Equivalents).

projectedFreeCashFlows.description: Calculated unlevered free cash flows for each projection year.

terminalValue.description: Calculated terminal value at the end of the projection period.

impliedPERatio.description: Implied P/E ratio if net income is available/projected.

effectiveTaxRate.description: Effective tax rate for NOPAT calculation, as a decimal (e.g., 0.21 for 21%).

midYearDiscounting.description: Whether to use mid-year convention for discounting cash flows.

workflow.stepName: Discount Cash Flows and Calculate Values
